description: Awni Eldous, who ran a small gaming channel, was one of the first Palestinian children to be killed in the war.
maintext: The Hamas-run health ministry in Gaza says more than 20,000 people have been killed there since the war began - more than a third of them children. The UN children's agency (Unicef) has described it as the "most dangerous place in the world to be a child".
title: Awni Eldous: The Palestinian boy who found YouTube fame after death
